page.title: 16SKIPTON SWIMMING BATHS
page.content: Aireville Swimming Baths is situated in Aireville Park, Skipton. It was opened by{Anita Longbough M.B.E.}on the{14th May 1964.}It costs 30 pence for an unlimited amount of time. Just off the entrance foyer there is a cafe which over looks a shallow learner's pool. There are two changing rooms next to each other. One for ladies, and one for Men. In the changing rooms you collect a basket to put your clothes in then find a cubicle to chang in. When you hand your clothes in an attendant takes them and gives you a band to put on your arm or leg to identify your basket. The pool is{1.0 metres}deep at the litte end and{3.5 metres}at the deep end. There is a{diving bord}and a {spring bord.}
